snippet.title: Space Hulk: Vengeance of the Blood Angels (PSX Intro)
snippet.description:
This is the PSX intro to Space Hulk - Vengeance of the Blood Angels. It is generally the same as the 3DO, Saturn, and PC versions, but it is worth showing. Afterwards, for effect, I let the recording run to include some footage of the main menu screen and the haunting music that accompanies it.

Space Hulk and Space Hulk: Vengeance of the Blood Angels produced by Electronic Arts.
Content of those games owned by Warhammer 40K.
